fast_food_items.name: Burger
fast_food_items.description: A classic American favorite - a juicy patty, fresh vegetables, and flavorful sauces in a bun.

fast_food_items.name: Pizza
fast_food_items.description: A mouthwatering combination of thin crust, rich tomato sauce, melted cheese, and various toppings.

fast_food_items.name: French Fries
fast_food_items.description: Crispy, golden-brown potato sticks, seasoned to perfection and served with a side of ketchup.

fast_food_items.name: Hot Dog
fast_food_items.description: A savory sausage served in a soft bun, topped with mustard, ketchup, onions, and relish.

fast_food_items.name: Taco
fast_food_items.description: A Mexican delight - a folded or rolled tortilla filled with a variety of ingredients like meat, beans, and veggies.

fast_food_items.name: Chicken Wings
fast_food_items.description: Crispy and spicy chicken wings, a favorite for parties and game nights.

fast_food_items.name: Ice Cream Cone
fast_food_items.description: Creamy and sweet ice cream in a crunchy cone, perfect for cooling off on a hot day.

fast_food_items.name: Burrito
fast_food_items.description: A flavorful wrap filled with rice, beans, meat, cheese, and toppings, inspired by Mexican cuisine.

fast_food_items.name: Onion Rings
fast_food_items.description: Crispy battered onion rings, a popular side dish with a delightful crunch.

fast_food_items.name: Cheeseburger
fast_food_items.description: Similar to a burger, but with an extra layer of melted cheese that adds a savory touch.

fast_food_items.name: Milkshake
fast_food_items.description: Thick and creamy milkshake, available in various flavors, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

fast_food_items.name: Nachos
fast_food_items.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, sour cream, and guacamole.

fast_food_items.name: Fish and Chips
fast_food_items.description: A classic British dish - battered and fried fish served with crispy fries.

fast_food_items.name: Donut
fast_food_items.description: Sweet and fluffy fried dough pastry, often topped with glaze, icing, or sprinkles.

fast_food_items.name: Gyro
fast_food_items.description: A Greek-inspired wrap with sliced meat, vegetables, and tangy tzatziki sauce.
